docs.lead_paragraph: Representative Eric Cantor, Republican of Virginia, had pointed to the broken window of his Richmond office as evidence that Democrats were not the only target of recent threats and vandalism.

docs.lead_paragraph: AT&T said Friday that it would take a $1 billion noncash accounting charge in the first quarter because of the health care overhaul and that it might cut benefits it offers to current and retired workers, The Associated Press reports.

headline.main: AT&T to Take $1 Billion Charge for Health Care

docs.lead_paragraph: All of us need to take some time every so often to knock things off of our financial to-do list. To help, we've created a series of articles and an interactive checklist to get you started.

headline.main: Financial Tuneup: Should I Take Less Risk?
